text:
Sushmita Sen’s Joke On Marriage Backfires, Gets Trolled As Not Everyone Found It Funny
Sushmita Sen’s Joke On Marriage Backfires, Gets Trolled As Not Everyone Found It Funny
Hailed as the eternal magnificent diva, Sushmita Sen has often inspired us all with her social media posts. From her motivational captions to her fitness videos and love-filled PDA posts for boyfriend Rohman Shawl, she makes headlines more often than not.
However, her recent post, a quote about marriage, didn’t go down too well her followers. She soon became a target of the trolls.
It all started after Sushmita Sen posted a quote that read, “Whoever invented marriage was creepy as hell. Like I love you so much I’m gonna get the government involved so you can’t leave.”
It was of course meant to be a joke. But looks like people didn’t find it funny. They trolled her left, right and centre.
Don't Miss 1 K SHARES 343 SHARES 174 SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
However, there were others too who found the joke extremely funny.
title: Sushmita Sen’s Joke On Marriage Backfires, Gets Trolled As Not Everyone Found It Funny

From her motivational captions to her fitness videos and love-filled PDA posts for boyfriend Rohman Shawl, she makes headlines very often. It was of course meant to be a joke. But looks like people didn’t find it funny. They trolled her left right and centre.
